GSD.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v5.10.121
GSD.description:
thermal/drivers/broadcom: Fix potential NULL dereference in sr_thermal_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit 79098339ac2065f4b4352ef5921628970b6f47e6, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit 250e211057c7237dc75634b1372a1a3bd58dcd96. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: thermal/drivers/broadcom: Fix potential NULL dereference in sr_thermal_probe
